sources.title: Battle In Outer Space (1959 Sci-Fi) Space Wages War on Earth! Directed by Ishiro Honda
sources.description:
The Moon is Captured! The Earth is Next...The Biggest Battle Ever Put on Film!
Aliens invade Earth with the full force of their spaceships and weapons. Everyone turns to the most powerful nations on Earth to destroy them, resulting in the most fierce battle the galaxy as ever seen.

Original title: 宇宙大戦争  (Uchû Daisensô)
Alternative titles:  Battle In Outer Space / The Great Space War

Director: Ishirô Honda
Writers: Shin'ichi Sekizawa, Jôjirô Okami
With : Ryô Ikebe, Kyôko Anzai, Minoru Takada, Koreya Senda
Genres: Japanese Cinema, Action, Science-Fiction, Space Opera


00:00 Full movie (with subtitles)
05:01 Dr. Adachi explains the mysterious disasters caused by freezing rays.
13:26 The SPIP spacecrafts are introduced as Earth's defense against Natal.
20:13 Dr. Adachi and Dr. Richardson prepare for the Moon mission.
36:28 The SPIP crew encounters alien missiles and engages in battle.
44:16 The team discovers a hidden tunnel leading to the alien base.
55:03 Iwamura sacrifices himself to protect the team from alien control.
1:02:45 The crew successfully infiltrates the alien base on the Moon.
1:10:12 A massive space battle erupts between Earth's forces and Natal's fleet.
1:17:30 Earth's final assault destroys the alien mothership and remaining forces.
1:23:15 Humanity celebrates victory and the world is declared safe.
1:29:00 Dr. Adachi reflects on the importance of unity in the face of adversity.



https://www.youtube.com/playlist?list=UUMOycDFnpMeWzaITQSD1dWsOA

@CultCinemaClassics

metadata.Plot: Munchkin-like aliens invade Earth full force with their flying saucers and laser weapons, rendering cities helpless. All eyes turn to the most powerful nations on Earth as they unite to concoct a plan to vanquish the aliens and return Earth to the hands of humans, thus, resulting in the most fierce and ultimate battle royale in outer space the galaxy as ever seen.
metadata.Actors: Ryô Ikebe, Kyôko Anzai, Minoru Takada
